code: import{Button,TextField}from"@mui/material";import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginComponent=_ref=>{let{onLogin}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const handleLogin=()=>{if(username==="forbit"&&password==="12345"){onLogin();}else{alert("Incurrect username or password");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:"100vh",width:"100%",display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:"50%",width:"50%",display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",borderRadius:10},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{height:"90%",width:"60%",borderRadius:5,display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",gap:20,borderBottom:"1px solid silver",boxShadow:"rgba(50, 50, 93, 0.25) 0px 30px 60px -12px inset, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 18px 36px -18px inset"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{color:"black"},children:"LOG IN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"User Name",type:"text",value:username,style:{width:"75%"},onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Password",type:"password",value:password,style:{width:"75%"},onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"button",onClick:handleLogin,style:{width:"75%",background:"#3887BE",color:"white"},children:"Login"})]})})});};export default LoginComponent;
